captions.text: Homemade meal

Not excited to go home
There are award melodies everywhere

Time passes by fast
After rain, waiting for a clear day
Let it be

Dad doesn't call often with
His old phones knows nothing
But he still trusts his young son

My youth is waking down the city
Where it flows heavily

There are clothes on the floor
I fall on the messy blankets

The air is thinner
There's no voice in my room

Love breaks me
It's broken like bubble

Greed makes me cloudy
Dispersed like wet fog
I miss homemade meal

The magic of family
Back to my warm family
where I can rest

I saw myself 
Annoyed I say I'm well
I'm on my thing

I tell my mom and dad I have
A lot to do, so I don't go see them A

If you stop and look back
There are many things you've missed

We just wander around
Don't go out

Look around you
There's no home for you here

My house, the bed I chose
When I painted it with my friends

And wondered what to put
In my room, I was happy then

I invited my girlfriend
And ate together than I felt
That this was my dream Oh

Everything finishes 
The rule of love
The mistake makes me fall

You can't walk as if 
You are blind-folded
I miss homemade meal

The magic of family
Back to my warm family
Where I can rest

Yeah the magic of family
That moment when I see my mom

She collects the clothes from
The floor and fills the pieces

She collects the thin air
And empties my greed

Someone who hugs
Me when I'm tired

Family's touch and 
The way they look at me

They are the ones who hug
Me when I'm tired

title: [MV] KIM BUM SOO(김범수) _ Home meal(집 밥) (Feat. Geeks(긱스), Mrs.Lee(이희선 여사))

the good things you have and you only want to go out but when you are far

you are -  the music & the lyric are really amazing, it´s like someone is 
singing your feelings. I love this song﻿

comments.text:
기다려지지 않는 퇴근길
길거리엔 온통 어색한 멜로디
시간을 빠르게 걸어가 내린 비 뒤에
맑은 날을 기다리고 있네 Let it be 
전화 통화가 뜸한 구식 폰을 잡은
아버지는 아무것도 모르고
믿고 계셔 어린 아들놈을
유난히 무겁게 흐르는
도시를 걷는 나의 청춘

바닥 위에 떨어진 옷들
흐트러진 이불 그대로 쓰러져
적막하게 옅어진 공기
내방 어디도 아무 말 없어

사랑이 날 부서지게 해
꼭 물거품처럼
산산조각이 났어
욕심이 날 흐려지게 해
꼭 물안개처럼
멀리 흩어져

집 밥 너무 그리워
가족의 마법
본가 따뜻한 집으로
내가 쉴 수 있는 곳

내 모습을 보았네
귀찮아하며 잘 지내 Im on my thing
어머니 아버지께 할 일이 많다며
찾아가지도 못해 A
잠시만 멈춰 돌아보면 놓친 것들이 너무 넘쳐
버린 우린 서성거릴 뿐 절대로
나가지 않아 주위를 봐 너의 집
여긴 어디에도 없어

내 집 내가 고른 침대 
친구들과 페인트 칠할 때
여긴 뭘 놓지 그땐 기뻤지
여자친구를 집에 초대해
함께 밥을 먹을 때 그때 느꼈지 
이게 바로 내 꿈이었다는 걸 Oh

어쩌다가 모든 게 끝나 사랑의 법칙
실수가 날 넘어지게 해
눈 가린 것처럼 
걸을 수 없어

집 밥 너무 그리워
가족의 마법
본가 따뜻한 집으로
내가 쉴 수 있는 곳

Yeah 가족의 마법 
엄마를 보는 그 순간

바닥 위에 떨어진 옷들 주워 담으며
내 조각을 채워
적막하게 옅어진 공기 쓸어 담으며
내 욕심을 게워
지친 나를 안아주는 건
가족의 손길 다정한 눈빛
지친 나를 안아주는 건﻿

comments.author: 이래건 (Gon)

comments.text:
Kim Bu Soo es el artista más increíble que puede digerir cualquier tipo de 
género musical, cruza la barrera del idioma y toca el corazón de sus 
oyentes mientras canta con el corazón y el alma...﻿
comments.author: Mileidy Padron

comments.text:
The more I listen to this song, the more I love it! As a foreign listener 
who does not understand the Korean language, I find that Kim Bum Soo is the 
most amazing artist who can digest any kind of music genre, crosses the 
language barrier and touched his listener’s heart as he sings with his 
heart and soul. His detail technical skills are just awesome in all music 
genres with various singing methods and various voice colour. Being the 
first Korean artist to enter the US Billboard Hot 100 music chart at 51st 
position in 2001 with no youtube at that time and despite his tripled crown 
status being able to perform at prestigious Sejong Centre, Carnegie Hall 
and Sydney Opera House which is many singers’ dream, I must agree to 
looloos that Kim Bum Soo is still underated internationally.  He deserves 
more attention so I just want to say Bum Soo, keep fighting!!!

Note: Ms. Lee (Hui Son Yi) is Kim Bum Soo's mother. He called and spoke to 
his mom at the end of the music video. With the help of a Korean friend, 
here is the translation of their sweet conversation:

Kim Bum Soo: Hi mom, I want to have your home made food.
Ms. Lee: Home made food?
Kim Bum Soo: Yes.
Ms. Lee: ok. I will cook as much as you want to eat.
Kim Bum Soo: Mom, I miss you.
Ms. Lee: I miss you too.
Kim Bum Soo: I love you.
Ms. Lee: I love you too.....﻿
comments.author: H Chan

comments.text:
+Irene Lim Yes I did and love it. Thanks for letting me know Irene. I 
bought a Maige TV box so that my friends and I can watch him live on KBS2, 
MBC, Mnet TV, tvN, etc. although there are no English subtitles but it does 
not matter as he crosses the language barriers . He sang "Eyes Nose and 
Lips" in his Seoul solo concert in October 2014 but not in this costume. Yu 
Huiyeol's Sketchbook was his second performance. He is a multi-dimensional 
performing artist! This "Jibap" MV is also on Mnet TV. Love his 8th album. 
He sings with wonderful detail techniques. His falsetto voice is higher 
than a soprano and is in the comfort zone!. He is not only a colourful 
vocalist, he is a colourful composer! Hope that he keeps composing as well. 
Please visit http://forums.soompi.com/en/discussion/115407/kim-bum-soo/p17 
It is all written in English. I have posted all recent articles, photos, 
album, live performances, realty shows there. Enjoy!
comments.author: H Chan

comments.text:
14.12.19 Yu Huiyeol's Sketchbook Ep 254 Kim Bum Soo sang Taeyang 'Eyes Nose 
Lips'. I am sure you'll love it!
comments.author: Irene Lim

comments.text:
+wlwndus2 “I am a Singer” has saved him from suffocation.  According to 
him, that program was his CPR.  I agree with wlwndus2  that he has 
established as a very strong singer and has built a name for himself. He 
has become the President of M Academy and one of the 4 main judges in 
Superstar K6. His fans are getting younger and well balance in terms of 
gender.  All these are wonderful achievements for him but he deserves more 
attention with his talents. It is another dream to watch his live 
performance.  Time to go listen to his colourful 8th album with his full 
face on it. “Faceless” album jacket is a thing in the past for him from now 
on.
comments.author: H Chan

comments.text:
+ABAntigens +The Home Depot  He's not underrated these days. Haha. He was 
in the past for a long time, but right now he's established as a very 
strong singer and has built a name for himself.
comments.author: wlwndus2

comments.text:
+ABAntigens Yes. I totally agree with you ABAntigens. He is so gifted and 
diligent. He has come a long way. If there is a decathlon award for 
vocalist in this world, he should be the one receiving it. With his 
excellent musicianship, renowned wittiness and humility, I am sure that he 
will gain more popularity both at home and abroad. He is already appearing 
more on TV through reality shows and I think it really help a lot. Let us 
just hope that more people will use their heart and ears to listen to music 
instead of using their eyes. My instant reaction was to salute to him after 
he finished singing "The Lord's Prayer" in the Korean language at the 
Sydney Opera House using the bel canto method. I was going OMG! OMG! He was 
perfect! It takes years to train. How did he do it? He is amazing!! His 
tenor voice is so angelic in another form and colour. It is my dream that 
he will be chosen to sing the national anthem at the opening of 2018 Winter 
Olympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea if a vocalist is required. I regard 
him as a national treasure. This clip is about his 8th Album "HIM" and I am 
going out of the way. lol.
comments.author: H Chan

comments.text: Sadly he's still underrated in terms of popularity even in Korea
comments.author: ABAntigens

comments.text:
totalmente de acuerdo con tu comentario, este hombre lo estremece a uno con 
sus canciones!!
comments.author: Mileidy Padron

comments.text:
I accidentally clicked this video, and I immediately liked this song so 
much. I love the description "Home meal (Featuring Geeks, Mrs.Lee)] is a 
folk style song that has the homemade feelings along with acoustic 
feelings. The lyric has the modern day people’s sentiments longing for 
Mom’s homemade meal. The melody line is warm yet lonely." because it 
explains the greatness of this song as well as its mv. Unique lyrics, great 
music.﻿
